title: Breaking Point

song_root.core_event: Realizing I've been carrying everyone else's weight for too long
song_root.core_resistance: Fear of seeming selfish if I say no
song_root.core_longing: To feel light again, to reclaim my boundaries
song_root.core_transformation: From exhausted caretaker to self-compassionate individual

song_intent.imagery_texture: Sharp edges, breaking glass, walls crumbling

technical_constraints.rule_breaking_justification: The constant displacement creates perpetual unease - representing the off-kilter feeling of finally saying 'enough.' Everything should feel slightly wrong until the moment of breaking.

notes: Fast tempo with phrygian mode for dark, urgent energy. Constant rhythmic displacement (all hits shifted 16th note late) to create anxiety. Build from controlled to explosive dynamics. Power chords with parallel motion for punk defiance.
